item.title: Death of a homeless man
item.content: Death of a homeless man

item.title: Love is not fair on its own
item.description: Love is not fair on its own Like the dark side of the Moon The scale tilts to the side Where hearts with heavy desire reside Countless plays abide by one rule One soul on fire — Till it cools A burning gaze — Rests upon a nameless bloom Scorched — Descending into the tomb
item.content:
Love is not fair on its own

Like the dark side of the Moon

The scale tilts to the side

Where hearts with heavy desire reside

Countless plays abide by one rule

One soul on fire —

Till it cools

A burning gaze —

Rests upon a nameless bloom

Scorched —

Descending into the tomb
